snippet.title: Goodnight Meowmie - Full Developer Playthrough (No Commentary) (v2.03)
snippet.description:
Play Goodnight Meowmie in your browser here: http://cocoamoss.com/goodnight-meowmie/goodnight-meowmie.html

Goodnight Meowmie is a narrative game that combines the comfort of a virtual pet simulator with the tension of a horror game.  It was originally made in 72 hours for round 41 of the Ludum Dare game jam competition, where it placed 14th overall, and has since been updated with new content and a reworked narrative.

Cocoa Moss is a collaboration between Kat Jia and DDRKirby(ISQ). 
 We strive to make heartwarming games that we can share with others.  Visit us at http://cocoamoss.com/

Soundtrack download: https://ddrkirbyisq.bandcamp.com/album/goodnight-meowmie-original-soundtrack
